uploadfolders.name: uploadfolders
uploadfolders.description: Upload file(s) contained in the folder(s) specified to the account.

options.name: paths
options.description: The file cabinet path or paths that contain the files to upload. To specify multiple paths, enter a space between paths and enclose the entire argument in double quotes. For example, "/SuiteScripts" "/SuiteScripts/Test".

options.name: project
options.description: Default option. Required if no default project has been set. Sets the folder or zip file containing the project. Overrides the previously set default project folder or zip file.

options.name: url
options.description: The domain url. Overrides the url set in the .sdf file.

options.name: email
options.description: The user's email. Overrides the email set in the .sdf file.

options.name: account
options.description: The account id. Overrides the account set in the .sdf file.

options.name: role
options.description: The role id. Overrides the role id set in the .sdf file.

importfiles.name: importfiles
importfiles.description: Import files from a NetSuite account.

options.name: paths
options.description: Specify the file cabinet file paths of the files to import.

options.name: excludeproperties
options.description: Exclude file and folder properties from the import.

options.name: project
options.description: Default option. Required if no default project has been set. Sets the folder or zip file containing the project. Overrides the previously set default project folder or zip file.

options.name: url
options.description: The domain url. Overrides the url set in the .sdf file.

options.name: email

options.name: account
options.description: The account id. Overrides the account set in the .sdf file.

options.name: role
options.description: The role id. Overrides the role id set in the .sdf file.

listbundles.name: listbundles
listbundles.description: List bundles from a NetSuite account.

options.name: url
options.description: The domain url.

options.name: email
options.description: The user's email.

options.name: account
options.description: The account id.

options.name: role
options.description: The role id.

options.name: parentdirectory
options.description: Sets the parent directory where the project will be created.

options.name: overwrite
options.description: Indicates that the existing project will be overwritten.

options.name: type
options.description: The project type. Can be ACCOUNTCUSTOMIZATION or SUITEAPP

options.name: projectname
options.description: The project name.

options.name: publisherid
options.description: The publisher id. This is mandatory when type specified is SUITEAPP.

options.name: projectid
options.description: The project id. This is mandatory when type specified is SUITEAPP.

options.name: projectversion
options.description: The project version. This is mandatory when type specified is SUITEAPP.

validate.name: validate
validate.description: Validate the folder or zip file containing the project.

options.name: log
options.description: Sets the validation log file location, as either a directory or a file name. If it is a directory, a default log file is generated in the specified location. If a log file already exists in the specified location, validation log details are appended to that existing file.

options.name: server
options.description: Indicates that validation will be performed server side.

options.name: applycontentprotection
options.description: Indicates that content protection will be applied.

options.name: accountspecificvalues
options.description: Flag account-specific values as either a warning or an error.

options.name: project
options.description: Default option. Required if no default project has been set. Sets the folder or zip file containing the project. Overrides the previously set default project folder or zip file.

options.name: url
options.description: The domain url. Overrides the url set in the .sdf file.

options.name: email
options.description: The user's email. Overrides the email set in the .sdf file.

options.name: account
options.description: The account id. Overrides the account set in the .sdf file.

options.name: role
options.description: The role id. Overrides the role id set in the .sdf file.

importobjects.name: importobjects
importobjects.description: Import custom objects from a NetSuite account.

options.name: appid
options.description: The application id. If specified, only custom objects that are associated with the app id are imported. Otherwise, only custom objects that are not associated with an app id are imported.

options.name: scriptid
options.description: Import custom objects with the specified script ids. Use a space separated list to indicate multiple script ids. Use "ALL" to import all custom objects of the specified type.

options.name: type
options.description: Import custom objects that are of the specified type. Only a single type or "ALL" can be specified. Use "ALL" to import all custom objects.

options.name: destinationfolder
options.description: Indicate where the custom objects will be saved. Specify the folder relative to the project (e.g. /Objects/testsubfolder). This must start with "/Objects".

options.name: project
options.description: Default option. Required if no default project has been set. Sets the folder or zip file containing the project. Overrides the previously set default project folder or zip file.

options.name: url
options.description: The domain url. Overrides the url set in the .sdf file.

options.name: email
options.description: The user's email. Overrides the email set in the .sdf file.

options.name: account
options.description: The account id. Overrides the account set in the .sdf file.

options.name: role
options.description: The role id. Overrides the role id set in the .sdf file.

options.name: paths
options.description: The file cabinet file paths of the files to upload. To specify multiple paths, enter a space between paths and enclose the entire argument in double quotes. For example, "/SuiteScripts/File.js" "/SuiteScripts/NewFile.js".

options.description: Default option. Required if no default project has been set. Sets the folder or zip file containing the project. Overrides the previously set default project folder or zip file.

listfiles.name: listfiles
listfiles.description: List files from a NetSuite account.

options.name: folder
options.description: Specify the file cabinet folder path. This is recursive, all files under subfolders will also be retrieved.

options.name: url
options.description: The domain url.

options.name: email
options.description: The user's email.

options.name: account
options.description: The account id.

options.name: role
options.description: The role id.

deploy.name: deploy
deploy.description: Deploys the folder or zip file containing the project. Project folder is compressed to a zip file before deployment.

options.name: log
options.description: Sets the deployment log file location, as either a directory or a file name. If it is a directory, a default log file is generated in the specified location. If a log file already exists in the specified location, deployment log details are appended to that existing file.

options.name: validate
options.description: Indicates that local validation of project should occur before deployment, with any errors stopping the deployment.

options.name: no_preview
options.description: Indicates that the preview step should be skipped.

options.name: skip_warning
options.description: Indicates that the warning before deployment to production account will be skipped.

options.name: applycontentprotection
options.description: Indicates that content protection will be applied.

options.name: accountspecificvalues
options.description: Flag account-specific values as either a warning or an error.

options.name: project
options.description: Default option. Required if no default project has been set. Sets the folder or zip file containing the project. Overrides the previously set default project folder or zip file.

options.name: url
options.description: The domain url. Overrides the url set in the .sdf file.

options.name: email
options.description: The user's email. Overrides the email set in the .sdf file.

options.name: account
options.description: The account id. Overrides the account set in the .sdf file.

options.name: role
options.description: The role id. Overrides the role id set in the .sdf file.

update.name: update
update.description: Update existing custom objects in the project folder from a NetSuite account.

options.name: scriptid
options.description: Lists the script IDs of custom objects to be updated.

listobjects.name: listobjects
listobjects.description: List custom objects from a NetSuite account.

options.name: appid
options.description: The application id. If specified, only custom objects that are associated with the app id are listed.  Otherwise, only custom objects that are not associated with an app id are listed.

options.name: scriptid
options.description: List custom objects that contain the specified script id. If this parameter is not specified, list all custom objects regardless of script id.

options.name: type
options.description: List custom objects that are of the specified types. Use a space separated list to indicate multiple types. If this parameter is not specified, list all custom objects regardless of type.

options.description: The domain url.

options.description: The user's email.

options.name: account
options.description: The account id.

project.name: project
project.description: Set the folder or zip file containing the project. Once specified it is used as the default by later commands.

options.name: project
options.description: Required if no default project has been set. Sets the folder or zip file containing the project. Overrides the previously set default project folder or zip file.

preview.name: preview
preview.description: Previews the deployment steps of a folder or zip file containing the project. Project folder is compressed to a zip file before previewing.

options.name: log
options.description: Sets the preview log file location, as either a directory or a file name. If it is a directory, a default log file is generated in the specified location. If a log file already exists in the specified location, preview log details are appended to that existing file.

options.description: Indicates that content protection will be applied.

options.description: Flag account-specific values as either a warning or an error.

options.description: The script id of the custom record object.

importbundle.name: importbundle
importbundle.description: Import a bundle and convert it to an Account Customization project.

options.name: project
options.description: Folder to import the bundle into. Account details will be loaded from a .sdf file inside this folder if it exists. Overrides the previously set default project folder.

options.name: bundleid
options.description: The bundle id. Used to specify which bundle to import.

options.name: url
options.description: The domain url. Overrides the url set in the .sdf file.

options.name: email
options.description: The user's email. Overrides the email set in the .sdf file.

options.name: account
options.description: The account id. Overrides the account set in the .sdf file.

options.name: role
options.description: The role id. Overrides the role id set in the .sdf file.

adddependencies.name: adddependencies
adddependencies.description: Add the missing dependencies to the manifest file.

options.name: all
options.description: Adds all missing dependencies to the SuiteCloud project.  When specified, ensure that you do not use the -feature, -file, and -object options.

options.name: feature
options.description: Specifies the feature dependency references to add to the SuiteCloud project.  Each reference is a name:value pair that is delimited by a space.  For example: CUSTOMRECORD:required ACCOUNTING:optional.  When specified, ensure that you do not use the -all option.

options.name: file
options.description: Specifies the files to add to the SuiteCloud project.  When specified, ensure that you do not use the -all option.

options.name: object
options.description: Specifies the object script IDs to add to the SuiteCloud project.  When specified, ensure that you do not use the -all option..

options.description: Default option. Required if no default project has been set. Sets the folder or zip file containing the project. Overrides the previously set default project folder or zip file.

options.description: The domain url. Overrides the url set in the .sdf file.

options.name: role
options.description: The role id. Overrides the role id set in the .sdf file.
